content: Thomas has the Bible in nine languages: Spanish, Esperanto, French, Greek, Hungarian, English, Latin, Portuguese and Russian.
translations: ita:Tommaso ha la Bibbia in nove lingueï¹• spagnolo, esperanto, francese, greco, ungherese, inglese, latino, portoghese e russ
